synopsis.text:
What begins as an ordinary life for Takumi Tsuzuki, a high school student and part-time baker at the 'Stray Cats' confectionery, quickly turns into a whirlwind of excitement and chaos. Alongside his childhood friend, Fumino Serizawa, who has a peculiar habit of expressing her feelings in reverse, Takumi navigates through the eccentricities of Umenomori Private Academy, fending off the whims of the pampered granddaughter of the board chairman, Chise Umenomori.

When Takumi's adoptive older sister, Otome Tsuzuki, brings home a mysterious girl named Nozomi Kiriya, who bears an uncanny resemblance to a large cat, Takumi's mundane life is flipped upside down. Nozomi, a runaway with a secretive past, finds solace at the 'Stray Cats' confectionery, working as a pâtissière and gradually opening up to her newfound family.

As Takumi and his friends embark on various adventures, from starting a 'Stray Cats' club to help people to navigating the complexities of their relationships, they discover that life is anything but ordinary. Amidst the chaos, Takumi must unravel the mystery behind Nozomi's past and help Fumino confront her true feelings in this heartwarming love comedy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
